ai-ne23:1.1_0: Herein, what is the shade of the dwelling?
ai-ne23:2.1_0: “Right thought, the mind should be rightly understood as right thought.”
ai-ne23:2.2_0: “Listening mind, we’re endowed with good mental conduct,” and good conduct.
ai-ne23:2.3_0: “Without applied thought,” he replied, and on the ground for a foundation.
ai-ne23:2.4_0: “Following right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, and right effort.
ai-ne23:2.5_0: she said: “Aside it is for him to see the sight of Udaya.”
ai-ne23:2.7_0: “It’s incapable of performing bad karma, for the development of it.”
